Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes are currently manufactured from zirconia.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9/3Y-TZP composite electrolytes -: effects of weight % 3Y-TZP particles

Sentencas: However, a disadvantage of zirconia is the high temperatures required for efficient operation, greater than 900degreesC for cells not utilising thin supported electrolytes.

Sentencas: A study to characterise the properties of an alternative composite solid electrolyte, based on a gadolinia doped ceria matrix surrounding yttria stabilised tetragonal zirconia particles is presented.

Sentencas: Composite samples produced using 1, 2, 5, 10 and 20 wt% zirconia particles were characterised using a range of different experimental techniques including scanning electron microscopy, transmission electron microscopy, X-ray diffraction, mechanical testing and impedance spectroscopy.
